tasks.title: Create TCP listener for agents
tasks.details:
## Overview
LLM agents combine reasoning with tool use. They plan actions, execute tools, observe results, and iterate until the task is complete. Common patterns include ReAct and chain-of-thought.

### Implementation
```go
listener, err := net.Listen("tcp", ":8080")
if err != nil { log.Fatal(err) }
defer listener.Close()

for {
    conn, err := listener.Accept()
    if err != nil { continue }
    go handleConnection(conn)
}
```

- Understand the core algorithm before coding
